Level 56, Stage in capturing Tiger
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 56, Stage in capturing Tiger
By Y.K. TAN on Tuesday, June 1, 2004 - 09:24 pm:

Stage 56

At the start of the stage, quickly run to the right and secure the henger by placing a box beneath the lefternmost box at the right. The ghost will come down and destroy the lefternmost box and jump up and stand on the box you created. Try to create a box right/beneath of you and you can completely stuck the henger in it while destroying the box and move to the right before the ghost comes down and kill you. After that, create a box for the jell and destroy it when it is on it and jump onto the metal ledge in which the jell formerly stood on.

After that, headbutt the box when the second jell stands on it, make sure you are not standing exactly beneath the box or you will die when the jell lands on you. After that, jump back to where the henger formerly is, and using the boxing method, climb up the ledge to where the second jell in which you killed.

Now is the tough part, time it properly.Just when the right ghost moves below, quickly box up and go to the topmost ledge, (BUT REMEMBER to kill the jell first by making a box than knocking it down.) make sure when you box up to the top right metal ledge without getting killed by the left ghost as you jump straight into it, nor the box be destroyed and hence you die by falling into the right ghost, so be careful.

At the right-topmost ledge, destroy all the boxes in the top of you. Wait for the henger to fly to your right as well as make sure you box the floor on your left and BOTH ghosts are below the box before you attempt to go and escape to the left.

When you reach there, make sure the jell is moving left. Jump down to the metal block below and destroy the wooden box left/beneath of you, so as to trap the jell. Than stand on the tip and destroy the box in which the jell is standing on to kill it.

Go to the top left most area of the screen and create a box there and destroy it to find a red wings. Take it and after the stage, you would be allowed to capture tiger in the bonus stage.

After that, drop down and take the key. Go back to near where the henger is and box your way to the door and win, just beware don't hit the ghost...
